word: But we may still rejoice in the fact that it is not yet too late for wrongs to be righted. Jesus is a risen, living Saviour, our Advocate in the courts of heaven. \93And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.\94 As soon as sinners see their sins in the light of God\92s Word, repent, and seek pardon with contrition of soul, confessing their sins, the Lord hears and answers.\97Letter 12a, 1893.
